Product highlights

  • GPS smartwatch with a sunlight-readable, high-resolution color touchscreen
  • Built-in sports apps include GPS-enabled running, biking, swimming, skiing, rowing and golfing — no phone connection required
  • Customize with free watch face designs, widgets and apps from our Connect IQ™ store
  • Receive smart notifications¹ and smart coaching from Garmin Connect™ when paired with your phone
  • Up to 8 days' battery life² in watch/activity tracking³ mode or up to 13 hours using GPS

Optimized Performance

[/kc_column_text][kc_column_text _id="325438" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#ffffff`,`font-family|,p`:`Dosis`,`font-size|,p`:`16px`,`font-weight|,p`:`400`,`text-transform|,p`:`none`},`box`:{`padding|`:`inherit inherit 50px inherit`}}}}"]

The Garmin Forerunner 735XT Watch with Tri Bundle empowers you to make each day faster, stronger, and more competitive than the last. The multisport functions adapt for running, swimming, sprinting, biking, or tri-training, with each broken down to more specific training functions. The wrist based heart rate monitor provides a full fitness scope. If you do it to push your body to the next level, the Garmin 735XT can track it and put you over the top. The Triathlon Bundle includes the Garmin HRM-Tri Monitor and Garmin HRM-Swim Monitor.

Our Story

[/kc_column_text][kc_row_inner _id="376389" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`40px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_column_inner width="33.33%" _id="368121"][kc_column_text _id="788162" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#d05214`,`font-family|,p`:`Oswald`,`font-size|,p`:`18px`,`font-weight|,p`:`700`,`text-transform|,p`:`uppercase`}}}}"]

Idea

[/kc_column_text][kc_column_text _id="274144" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#616161`,`font-family|,p`:`Dosis`,`font-size|,p`:`16px`,`font-weight|,p`:`400`}}}}"]

The project was born in June 2014, when Mehdi Izemmour was actively looking for an idea able to open the doors to a new market.
He wanted to start a service combining luxury and fashion with technology. After several months of research, Mehdi designed the main aspects of the

[/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][kc_column_inner width="33.33%" _id="172478"][kc_column_text _id="784251" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#d05214`,`font-family|,p`:`Oswald`,`font-size|,p`:`18px`,`font-weight|,p`:`700`,`text-transform|,p`:`uppercase`}}}}"]

Realisation

[/kc_column_text][kc_column_text _id="198661" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#616161`,`font-family|,p`:`Dosis`,`font-size|,p`:`16px`,`font-weight|,p`:`400`}}}}"]

The project was born in June 2014, when Mehdi Izemmour was actively looking for an idea able to open the doors to a new market.
He wanted to start a service combining luxury and fashion with technology. After several months of research, Mehdi designed the main aspects of the

[/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][kc_column_inner width="33.33%" _id="833121"][kc_column_text _id="101095" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#d05214`,`font-family|,p`:`Oswald`,`font-size|,p`:`18px`,`font-weight|,p`:`700`,`text-transform|,p`:`uppercase`}}}}"]

Launch

[/kc_column_text][kc_column_text _id="131273" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#616161`,`font-family|,p`:`Dosis`,`font-size|,p`:`16px`,`font-weight|,p`:`400`}}}}"]

To succeed in carrying out his project, Mehdi had to look for a production partner. This task was difficult, the entrepreneur’s young age working against him. After several setbacks in Switzerland, Mehdi looked overseas. Fully committed to respecting resources, he had to eliminate some producing countries from his list.

[/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][/kc_row_inner][/kc_column][/kc_row][kc_row use_container="yes" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`background`:{`background|`:`eyJjb2xvciI6IiMyMTIxMjEiLCJsaW5lYXJHcmFkaWVudCI6WyIiXSwiaW1hZ2UiOiJub25lIiwicG9zaXRpb24iOiIwJSAwJSIsInNpemUiOiJhdXRvIiwicmVwZWF0IjoicmVwZWF0IiwiYXR0YWNobWVudCI6InNjcm9sbCIsImFkdmFuY2VkIjowfQ==`},`box`:{`padding|`:`80px inherit 60px inherit`}}}}" _id="498025"][kc_column width="12/12" video_bg_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOWFVKb2JqM" _id="523132"][kc_row_inner column_align="middle" video_bg_url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dOWFVKb2JqM" _id="493476"][kc_column_inner width="33%" _id="677324"][kc_column_text _id="61439" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`767`:{`typography`:{`font-size|,p`:`80px`,`line-height|,p`:`100px`}},`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#d05214`,`font-family|,p`:`Oswald`,`font-size|,p`:`138px`,`line-height|,p`:`170px`,`text-transform|,p`:`none`}}}}"]

Built
to
Last

[/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner][kc_column_inner width="67%" _id="556153"][kc_single_image image_size="full" _id="270592" image_source="media_library" image="2326"][kc_row_inner# _id="456308" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`box`:{`margin|`:`30px inherit inherit inherit`}}}}"][kc_column_inner# width="50{44f7c1589f6bd4c3b662b59f06657639299f6023a81544ef4d9cfa95aab9700b}" _id="180608"][kc_column_text _id="745117" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#999999`}}}}"]

These 3 words describe our products, our company, our culture — and our future. As a leading worldwide provider of navigation, we are committed to making superior products for automotive, aviation, marine, outdoor and fitness markets that are an essential part

Our vertical integration business model keeps all design, manufacturing, marketing and warehouse processes

[/kc_column_text][/kc_column_inner#][kc_column_inner# width="50{44f7c1589f6bd4c3b662b59f06657639299f6023a81544ef4d9cfa95aab9700b}" _id="823091"][kc_column_text _id="341243" css_custom="{`kc-css`:{`any`:{`typography`:{`color|,p`:`#999999`}}}}"]

in-house, giving us more control over timelines, quality and service. Our user-friendly products are not only sought after for their compelling design, superior quality and best value, but they also have innovative features that enhance the lives of our customers.

We have 11,400 associates in 50 offices worldwide.

item.title: Forerunner 230
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Connect and Customize

Smart notifications4, automatic uploads4 to Garmin Connect and live tracking make 735XT the ultimate smartwatch for athletes. Keep your phone tucked away when you’re on a long ride or run, and get all your notifications at the wrist so you can decide to respond or keep moving. Also, with Garmin Connect™ Mobile’s ability to share your runs and workouts, cheerleading doesn’t just take place at the sidelines anymore. Your friends and family can view and comment, no matter how far away they are. You can even customize your device with free watch faces, apps and data fields from Connect IQ to really make 735XT your watch.

You Do It All, Now Your Watch Can Too

Be a better athlete today than you were yesterday with Forerunner 735XT. This GPS running watch with multisport features is for athletes who want dialed-in data for training and a lighter load on race day. A smaller form factor and comfortable band make 735XT the ideal watch to get you from workout through workday. Connected features4 like automatic uploads to Garmin Connect, our free online fitness community, let you share your stats and triumphs through social media

Run, Sprint, Swim, Bike, Tri

Be a better athlete today than you were yesterday with Forerunner 735XT. This GPS running watch with multisport features is for athletes who want dialed-in data for training and a lighter load on race day. item.title: Forerunner 220
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Connect and Customize

Smart notifications4, automatic uploads4 to Garmin Connect and live tracking make 735XT the ultimate smartwatch for athletes. Keep your phone tucked away when you’re on a long ride or run, and get all your notifications at the wrist so you can decide to respond or keep moving. Also, with Garmin Connect™ Mobile’s ability to share your runs and workouts, cheerleading doesn’t just take place at the sidelines anymore. Your friends and family can view and comment, no matter how far away they are. You can even customize your device with free watch faces, apps and data fields from Connect IQ to really make 735XT your watch.

You Do It All, Now Your Watch Can Too

Be a better athlete today than you were yesterday with Forerunner 735XT. This GPS running watch with multisport features is for athletes who want dialed-in data for training and a lighter load on race day. A smaller form factor and comfortable band make 735XT the ideal watch to get you from workout through workday. Connected features4 like automatic uploads to Garmin Connect, our free online fitness community, let you share your stats and triumphs through social media

Also, with Garmin Connect™ Mobile’s ability to share your runs and workouts, cheerleading doesn’t just take place at the sidelines anymore. Your friends and family can view and comment, no matter how far away they are. You can even customize your device with free watch faces, apps and data fields from Connect IQ to really make 735XT your watch.

You Do It All, Now Your Watch Can Too

Be a better athlete today than you were yesterday with Forerunner 735XT. This GPS running watch with multisport features is for athletes who want dialed-in data for training and a lighter load on race day. A smaller form factor and comfortable band make 735XT the ideal watch to get you from workout through workday. Connected features4 like automatic uploads to Garmin Connect, our free online fitness community, let you share your stats and triumphs through social media

Activity Tracking Features

Step counter
Auto goal (learns your activity level and assigns a daily step goal)
Move bar (displays on device after a period of inactivity; walk for a couple of minutes to reset it)
Sleep monitoring (monitors total sleep and periods of movenment or restful sleep

Wear Your Personality on Your Sleeve

Download the free Garmin Face-It™ watch face app to customize your device with any photo from your smartphone. Just download the app, choose an image from your photo library, adjust the style for time and set it as your watch’s face. Whether it’s a scenic view from your last hike or a picture of your new puppy, with Garmin you can add personality to your watch that’s uniquely you. Available on App Store™ and Google Play™.
[embed]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SaC00homOiA[/embed]

GPS Running Watch with Multisport Features and Wrist-based Heart Rate

  • Measures heart rate at the wrist¹ so you can run freer on race day
  • Provides advanced dynamics² for running, cycling and swimming 7, including ground contact time balance, stride length, vertical ratio and more
  • Offers VO2 max estimate, lactate threshold³, race predictor and recovery advisor
  • Connected features4: smart notifications, automatic uploads to Garmin Connect™, live tracking and more
  • Offers VO2 max estimate, lactate threshold³, race predictor and recovery advisor

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Smart Notifications

Displays call, email, text and other alerts.

Virtual Pacer

Compares your current pace to your target pace.

Wrist-based Heart Rate1

Elevate™ wrist heart rate technology monitors your heart rate at the wrist 24/7 so you can run without a chest strap.

Run/Walk

Going on runs with walking breaks is easy, thanks to the run/walk mode. Let your watch tell you when it’s time to slow down or speed up.

Advanced Running Dynamics

Measures ground contact time balance, stride length, vertical ratio and more.

Live Tracking

Displays call, email, text and other alerts.

Connected Features
